fields.description: Person responsible for a project, mission, cruise, and data and should receive notifications when updates to a project, mission, cruise or data occur
An application Maintainer, this is a person who can create users, groups and can modify lookup tables.
A person responsible for data collected on a cruise. Aside from a chief scientists, this person will be a point of contact for data and should be notified when there are updates to the data.
Data Technicians process samples and will be responsible for submitting data for further processing and quality control on a mission.
Datashop processors are responsible for secondary processing and loading data to Biochem and will be notified when data is submitted.
